forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Rain may be heavy late. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Rain may be heavy late. High around 65F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with mostly cloudy conditions overnight. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
